/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -Wall   -shared -Wl,-soname,libopaquedriver.so -o libopaquedriver.so CMakeFiles/opaquedriver.dir/opaquedriver.o ../../../libplayercore/libplayercore.so.3.0.2 -lrt ../../../libplayerinterface/libplayerinterface.so.3.0.2 ../../../libplayercommon/libplayercommon.so.3.0.2 -lpthread -lltdl -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/src/player-3.0.2/build/libplayercore:/usr/local/src/player-3.0.2/build/libplayerinterface:/usr/local/src/player-3.0.2/build/libplayercommon
